review: Absolutely Awesome! I wish it wasn't back ordered - I'd buy a bunch for Christmas! I have Chromecast but find it a bit cumbersome to use. It also does not have access to Amazon...which was key. Easy to set up - easy to use!
author: Johannah Curtis

review: We love our Fire TV Stick. Quick & Responsive. Streaming is a breeze. 1GB memory and extra storage is a plus. Paid the discounted pre-order price. $39 is a bit much but is definitely a more cost effective solution to upgrade to a smart TV.
author: Debra N. Lowery

review: Audio while using the Fire TV stick will intermittently have a short buzz sound.  It is very distracting and takes away from the experience.Occasionally, it will shift the displaying of the video in a way that cuts off about a third of the right side of the picture.  This affects the home screen and the apps.  If I reset the stick it will work for awhile.Others have mentioned the difficulty in opening the battery compartment on the remote.  The design was not intuitive, but I was able to figure it out.  And the stick had to reset a couple of times during an update.But these issues were not near as much of a problem as the screwy audio and chopped off video.  I'm disappointed and feel that the promotional $19 was too high for the product I'm experiencing.
author: L. Newton

review: I love my Amazon Fire TV Stick.
author: Terrence

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick was more than I expected.  It has the capabilities of my Roku with the portability and ability to cast from my phone or tablet like Google's Chromecast.  Best of both worlds.
author: Amazon Customer
